constraints.constraint: A qualifier constraint MAY constrain another constraint in this spec.

qualifiers.constraint: A qualifier MUST qualify the constraint that is its parent only.

constraints.constraint: Every spec that inherits from this spec aggregates all of this spec's structural specdoc's properties and property values, including any properties this spec has inherited.

qualifiers.constraint: Inherited contraints MUST NOT be qualified in this spec.

constraints.constraint: A doc is said to conform to this spec iff there exists no included specdoc that contains a constraint which is violated by the doc.
Every included specdoc is itself a doc which conforms to the spec referred to in the spec property
